author: Muscat Daily
title: France's Thales to provide security solutions at Muscat Salalah airports
text: (MENAFN - Muscat Daily) Muscat- Thales a French multinational provider of security solutions for critical infrastructure has been selected by Oman's Ministry of Transport and Communications (MOTC) for the full deployment of integrated security solutions at the Muscat and Salalah airports. Thales will deliver state-of-the-art technologies to ensure the protection of both infrastructures as well as travellers the company said in a press statement on its website. Thales is taking charge as master system integrator (MSI) for both airports and is providing a high technology integrated security solution managed by an airport operation control centre including perimeter intrusion detection system video protection system access control screening equipment security check points access and backbone network along with data centres to ensure high performance and quality of services. In addition Thales is responsible for testing new technologies training operators and developing new procedures for improving the airports' multi-faceted operations. The new Muscat is one of Oman's largest infrastructure projects. When its new terminal building opens annual passenger capacity will reach 12mn helping the sultanatewith the development of its tourism industry. The new airport in Salalah was officially opened in June with an initial annual capacity of 1mn passengers. Both airports can accommodate the world's largest aircraft the Airbus A380. 'Thales' experience in provision of security solutions is playing a crucial role in ensuring the efficient and on-time delivery of all systems and equipment to the Muscat and Salalah airports. The state-of-the-art technologies are also helping the airports become interconnected through hub development with inter-operability and full service support for security stakeholders' Thales said. 'This selection is the latest in a long line of projects confirming Thales's position as a leader in global airport security solutions.' Thales secures the latest and critical infrastructures including the airports in Dubai and Doha the new commercial port in Doha and oil and gas sites in Saudi Arabia Algeria and Iraq.
